sub_title: Project Management | Digital Marketing | Campaign Operations
summary:
Hands-on digital media professional: project management as a passion, organization as motivation, and analytics combined with emotional intelligence as a means to an end. 

Skilled in Project Management, Digital and Content Marketing, Web Strategies, B2C & B2B Marketing, and Campaign Activation; including experience in managing budgets with analytical and data-based decision making. Working in global environments with international and virtual teams, accompanied by a proactive and confident mentality, helped me develop strong cross-functional relationship management skills.

I bring energy and creativity to work every day and my key strengths include managing projects' financial issues, risk mitigation, and the ability to adapt to different situations quickly. Great at organizing others into effective teams and turning concepts into practical working procedures.
